verses.verse: A <S%H7892>Song<s%> or <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph.<s%> Keep not you <S%H1824>silence,<s%> O <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H2790>hold<s%> not your <S%H2790>peace,<s%> and be not <S%H8252>still,<s%> O <S%H410>God.<s%>
For, <S%H2009>see,<s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%> make a <S%H1993>tumult:<s%> and they that <S%H8130>hate<s%> you have <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up the <S%H7218>head.<s%>
They have taken <S%H6191>crafty<s%> <S%H5475>counsel<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> your <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H3289>consulted<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> your <S%H6845>hidden<s%> ones.

They have <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3212>Come,<s%> and let us <S%H3582>cut<s%> them off from being a <S%H1471>nation;<s%> that the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> may be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> in <S%H2142>remembrance.<s%>
For they have <S%H3289>consulted<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> with one <S%H3820>consent:<s%> they are <S%H1285>confederate<s%> <S%H3772><s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you:
The <S%H168>tabernacles<s%> of <S%H123>Edom,<s%> and the <S%H3459>Ishmaelites;<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and the <S%H1905>Hagarenes;<s%>
<S%H1381>Gebal,<s%> and <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> and <S%H6002>Amalek;<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> with the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre;<s%>
<S%H804>Assur<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> is <S%H3867>joined<s%> with them: they have <S%H2220>helped<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3876>Lot.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
<S%H6213>Do<s%> to them as to the <S%H4080>Midianites;<s%> as to <S%H5516>Sisera,<s%> as to <S%H2985>Jabin,<s%> at the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of <S%H7028>Kison:<s%>
Which <S%H8045>perished<s%> at <S%H5874>Endor:<s%> they <S%H1961>became<s%> as <S%H1828>dung<s%> for the <S%H127>earth.<s%>
<S%H7896>Make<s%> their <S%H5081>nobles<s%> like <S%H6157>Oreb,<s%> and like <S%H2062>Zeeb:<s%> yes, <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5257>princes<s%> as <S%H2078>Zebah,<s%> and as <S%H6759>Zalmunna:<s%>
<S%H834>Who<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Let us take to ourselves the <S%H4999>houses<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H3423>possession.<s%>
O my <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H7896>make<s%> them like a <S%H1534>wheel;<s%> as the <S%H7179>stubble<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7307>wind.<s%>
As the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H1197>burns<s%> a <S%H3293>wood,<s%> and as the <S%H3852>flame<s%> <S%H3857>sets<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> on <S%H3857>fire;<s%>
<S%H3651>So<s%> <S%H7291>persecute<s%> them with your <S%H5591>tempest,<s%> and make them <S%H926>afraid<s%> with your <S%H5492>storm.<s%>
<S%H4390>Fill<s%> their <S%H6440>faces<s%> with <S%H7036>shame;<s%> that they may <S%H1245>seek<s%> your <S%H8034>name,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
Let them be <S%H954>confounded<s%> and <S%H926>troubled<s%> for <S%H5703>ever;<s%> yes, let them be put to <S%H2659>shame,<s%> and <S%H6>perish:<s%>

That men may <S%H3045>know<s%> that you, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H905>alone<s%> is <S%H3068>JEHOVAH,<s%> are the <S%H5945>most<s%> <S%H5945>high<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
